common_2150_head_teacher_01:
I would like to extend my thanks to everyone who
made this extraordinary tournament possible.[npcn:A]
common_2150_head_teacher_02:
Each and every Trainer demonstrated beautifully
the bond they share with their Pokémon.\r
I couldn’t take my eyes off any of the matches![npcn:A]
common_2150_head_teacher_03a:
“Taking lessons from tradition—growing stronger
and greater.”[npcn:A]
common_2150_head_teacher_03b:
“Leading the way into the future—while valuing
our individuality.”[npcn:A]
common_2150_head_teacher_04a:
That is our motto at Naranja Academy... And the
tournament truly lived up to our ideals![npcn:A]
common_2150_head_teacher_04b:
That is our motto at Uva Academy... And the
tournament truly lived up to our ideals![npcn:A]
common_2150_head_teacher_05:
Now, I’m aware my speeches tend to get a little,
shall we say, overlong, so I’ll wrap it up there.[npcn:A]
common_2150_head_teacher_06:
I now turn the floor over to our special guest,
Chairwoman Geeta.[npcn:A]
common_2150_top_01:
The friendly rivalry of the Trainers... The cheering
and encouragement from the crowd...[npcn:11]
common_2150_top_02:
I feel like these are the perfect ingredients for
the academy—[npcn:11]
common_2150_top_03:
no, for the whole Paldea region to become more
lively and energized![npcn:11]
common_2150_top_04:
[BD06:0]Champion [trnm:0] was far
stronger\r
today\r
than\r
when\r
[s:g]he\r
took\r
the\r
Pokémon\r
League’s\r
final test...[npcn:11]
common_2150_top_05:
It is clear that [s:g]he strives to become better every
day, even after reaching such an esteemed rank![npcn:11]
common_2150_top_06:
It is my sincere hope that all Paldea’s people will
be inspired not just by h[im;er:g] but by every Trainer\r
gathered here who aimed for new heights...[npcn:11]
common_2150_top_07:
and that the seeds for many more future
Champions will be sown![npcn:11]
common_2150_top_08: I eagerly await news of all your achievements![npcn:11]
common_2150_head_teacher_08:
Now, alas, it is time for this wonderful tournament
to come to an end...\c
BUT![npcn:A]
common_2150_head_teacher_09:
This event seems to me to be a wonderful way to
build rapport between faculty and students and\r
invigorate the wider community beyond our walls.\c
So...[npcn:A]
common_2150_head_teacher_10:
I hereby declare that the Academy Ace
Tournament will not end as a one-time event\r
and will continue to be held regularly![npcn:A]
common_2150_mobs_01:
Wooo! Awesome! Director Clavell, you’re the
best!
common_2150_mobs_02: Maybe I’ll join next time, too!
common_2150_rival_01: Oh my gosh, YES! This is everything I wanted![npcn:4]
common_2150_head_teacher_11:
I do hope you’ll participate next time,
Miss Nemona.[npcn:A]
common_2150_rival_02: Absolutely! I wouldn’t miss it for anything![npcn:4]
common_2150_head_teacher_12:
Well, dear students and staff, that wraps up our
very first Academy Ace Tournament.[npcn:A]
common_2150_head_teacher_13:
Thank you again for joining us here today, and I
hope you’re all excited for the next one![npcn:A]
